Detailed Description

XML parsing related errors.

This exception is used for error related to XML parsing and data extraction

Todo:
As we migrate to Boost.PropertyTree the source fo the tree os not necessarily XML. Which means that I may need to rename this class.
Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>
